page.title: 14A TYPICAL SATURDAY
page.content: Wake at 6:15 and put the stereo on quiet with headphones.Mum comes into my room at half past seven to get breakfast.Go downstairs to kitchen to have cereal and toast.Wash, get dressed take a few pounds out of my safe.Put my coat on and go out in the garage to get my bike and mum's bike.Ride down town at 8:30.Get down nan's at 8:35.Watch Sesame Street.Then I go to look around the shops and buy something.Come back to nans to have lunch at 11:30.And watch TV till 12:30 when mum comes. Ride up to home again .Get changed and call for my friends. Get the cardboard out on the pavement and put the stereo on the grass.Do breakdancing on the cardboard for another hour then go out on my BMX for another hour.Go into Rich's house and watch the video till tea.Go out till 8:45.Go to bed,read,then to sleep.
